member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.None
member.summary: No flags are set.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.AlwaysOffline
member.summary: The browser will operate in offline mode. Equivalent to DLCTL_FORCEOFFLINE.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.BackgroundSounds
member.summary: The browser will play background sounds. Equivalent to DLCTL_BGSOUNDS.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.DontRunActiveX
member.summary: Specifies that the browser will not run Active-X controls. Use this setting to disable Flash movies. Equivalent to DLCTL_NO_RUNACTIVEXCTLS.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.IgnoreCache
member.summary: Specifies that the browser should fetch the content from the server. If the server's content is the same as the cache, the cache is used.Equivalent to DLCTL_RESYNCHRONIZE.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.IgnoreProxy
member.summary: The browser will force the request from the server, and ignore the proxy, even if the proxy indicates the content is up to date.Equivalent to DLCTL_PRAGMA_NO_CACHE.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.Images
member.summary: Specifies that the browser should download and display images. This is set by default. Equivalent to DLCTL_DLIMAGES.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.NoActiveXDownload
member.summary: Disables downloading and installing of Active-X controls.Equivalent to DLCTL_NO_DLACTIVEXCTLS.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.NoBehaviours
member.summary: Disables web behaviours.Equivalent to DLCTL_NO_BEHAVIORS.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.NoCharSets
member.summary: The browser suppresses any HTML charset specified.Equivalent to DLCTL_NO_METACHARSET.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.NoClientPull
member.summary: Indicates the browser will ignore client pulls.Equivalent to DLCTL_NO_CLIENTPULL.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.NoJava
member.summary: The browser will not download or display Java applets.Equivalent to DLCTL_NO_JAVA.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.NoFrameDownload
member.summary: The browser will download framesets and parse them, but will not download the frames contained inside those framesets.Equivalent to DLCTL_NO_FRAMEDOWNLOAD.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.NoScripts
member.summary: The browser will not execute any scripts.Equivalent to DLCTL_NO_SCRIPTS.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.OfflineIfNotConnected
member.summary: If the browser cannot detect any internet connection, this causes it to default to offline mode.Equivalent to DLCTL_OFFLINEIFNOTCONNECTED.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.UTF8
member.summary: Specifies that UTF8 should be used.Equivalent to DLCTL_URL_ENCODING_ENABLE_UTF8.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.BrowserOptions.Videos
member.summary: The browser will download and display video media.Equivalent to DLCTL_VIDEOS.

member.name: T:Arachnode.Renderer.tagCONTROLINFO
member.summary: Contains parameters that describe a control's keyboard mnemonics and keyboard behavior.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.tagCONTROLINFO.cb
member.summary: Size of the CONTROLINFO structure.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.tagCONTROLINFO.hAccel
member.summary: Handle to an array of Windows ACCEL structures, each structure describing a keyboard mnemonic.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.tagCONTROLINFO.cAccel
member.summary: Number of mnemonics described in the hAccel field.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.tagCONTROLINFO.dwFlags
member.summary: Flags that indicate the keyboard behavior of the control.

member.name: M:Arachnode.Renderer.tagCONTROLINFO.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:Arachnode.Renderer.tagCTRLINFO
member.summary: Flags that indicate the keyboard behavior of the control.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.tagCTRLINFO.CTRLINFO_EATS_RETURN
member.summary: When the control has the focus, it will process the Return key.

member.name: F:Arachnode.Renderer.tagCTRLINFO.CTRLINFO_EATS_ESCAPE
member.summary: When the control has the focus, it will process the Escape key.

member.name: T:Arachnode.Renderer.IPropertyNotifySink
member.summary: Standard notification interface that supports bindable and request-edit properties.

member.name: M:Arachnode.Renderer.IPropertyNotifySink.OnChanged(System.Int32)
member.summary: Notifies a sink that the [bindable] property specified by has changed
member.param: Dispatch identifier of the property that changed, or DISPID_UNKNOWN if multiple properties have changed.

member.name: M:Arachnode.Renderer.IPropertyNotifySink.OnRequestEdit(System.Int32)
member.summary: Notifies a sink that a [requestedit] property is about to change and that the object is asking the sink how to proceed.
member.param: Dispatch identifier of the property that is about to change or DISPID_UNKNOWN if multiple properties are about to change.

member.name: T:Arachnode.Renderer.IOleControl
member.summary: Provides the features for supporting keyboard mnemonics (GetControlInfo, OnMnemonic), ambient properties (OnAmbientPropertyChange), and events (FreezeEvents) in control objects.

member.name: M:Arachnode.Renderer.IOleControl.GetControlInfo(Arachnode.Renderer.tagCONTROLINFO)
member.summary: Fills in a CONTROLINFO structure with information about a control's keyboard mnemonics and keyboard behavior.
member.param: Pointer to the caller-allocated CONTROLINFO structure to be filled in.
member.returns: if the structure was filled successfully; the control has no mnemonics.

member.name: M:Arachnode.Renderer.IOleControl.OnMnemonic(Arachnode.Renderer.MSG@)
member.summary: Informs a control that the user has pressed a keystroke that matches one of the ACCEL entries in the mnemonic table returned through . The control takes whatever action is appropriate for the keystroke.
member.param: Pointer to the structure describing the keystroke to be processed.

member.name: M:Arachnode.Renderer.IOleControl.OnAmbientPropertyChange(System.Int32)
member.summary: Informs a control that one or more of the container's ambient properties (available through the control site's IDispatch) has changed.
member.param: Dispatch identifier of the ambient property that changed. If the dispID parameter is DISPID_UNKNOWN, it indicates that multiple properties changed.

member.name: M:Arachnode.Renderer.IOleControl.FreezeEvents(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates whether the container is ignoring or accepting events from the control.
member.param: Indicates whether the container will ignore () or now process () events from the control.
